# Welcome to FairMind Discussions

Welcome to the FairMind community. We're excited to have you here.

## What is FairMind?

FairMind is a comprehensive AI governance, bias detection, and compliance platform for responsible AI development. We help ensure fairness, transparency, and accountability in AI systems.

## Discussion Categories

We have several discussion categories to help organize conversations:

- **General Discussion** - General discussions about FairMind, questions, and community chat
- **Q&A** - Ask questions and get help from the community
- **Ideas** - Share ideas and feature requests for FairMind
- **Show & Tell** - Showcase your work, integrations, and success stories with FairMind
- **Announcements** - Official announcements and updates from the FairMind team

## How to Get Started

1. **Explore the Project**: Check out our [README](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/blob/main/README.md) to learn more about FairMind
2. **Read the Docs**: Visit our [documentation](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/tree/main/docs) for detailed guides
3. **Find Issues**: Look for [good first issues](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22) to contribute
4. **Join Discussions**: Ask questions, share ideas, or just say hello!

## Community Guidelines

- Be respectful and inclusive
- Help others learn and grow
- Share knowledge and experiences
- Follow our [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/blob/main/.github/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

## Resources

- **Documentation**: [docs/](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/tree/main/docs)
- **Contributing Guide**: [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/blob/main/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- **Roadmap**: [ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/blob/main/ROADMAP.md)
- **Issues**: [Issues](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/issues)
- **Pull Requests**: [Pull Requests](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/pulls)

## Get Involved

- **Contribute Code**: Check out our [contributing guide](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/blob/main/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- **Report Bugs**: [Open an issue](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/issues/new)
- **Suggest Features**: Share your ideas in the Ideas category
- **Help Others**: Answer questions in Q&A

We're building a community around ethical AI and fairness. Your participation makes FairMind better for everyone!

---

**Questions?** Feel free to ask in the Q&A category or open an issue.

**Ready to contribute?** Check out our [good first issues](https://github.com/adhit-r/fairmind/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22)!

Let's build ethical AI together.
